name: Dwarf King's Axe [2]
description: Dwarven Warlord Dann's portable battle axe, along with his numerous thrilling wars, symbolizes dwarven tenacity.

name: Ear Muffs
description: Ear muffs that prevent noise and cold weather. It's surprisingly cute to wear.

name: Ear Muffs Blueprint
description: Ear muffs that prevent noise and cold weather. It's surprisingly cute to wear.

name: Ear Muffs [1]
description: Ear muffs that prevent noise and cold weather. It's surprisingly cute to wear.

name: Earth Axe [1]
description: The axe with the power of earth. Using the latest craftsmanship, Yellow Live is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Earth Axe [2]
description: The axe with the power of earth. Using the latest craftsmanship, Yellow Live is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Earth Bow [2]
description: A bow seemingly made of mud.

name: Earth Bow[3]
description: A bow seemingly made of mud.

name: Earth Controlling Alloy
description: Increases earth M.Dmg/Dmg by 15% for 6 min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 10 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Earth Egg
description: The egg with earth attribute. After use, Your attack turns into earth attribute and the effect lasts 30 minutes. Unable to coexist with Great Nature.

name: Earth Immunity Alloy
description: Immune to all Earth Damage for 1min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 5 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth.

name: Earth Knife [1]
description: Daggers with the power of earth. Using the latest craftsmanship, Yellow Live is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Earth Knife [2]
description: Daggers with the power of earth. Using the latest craftsmanship, Yellow Live is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Earth Mastery Alloy
description: Increases earth M.Dmg/Dmg by 5% for 30 min. Cannot work with Ice/Hurricane/Fire Mastery Alloy. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Earth Resist Alloy
description: Reduces earth damage by 50% for 5min. Cannot work with Ice/Hurricane/Fire Alloy effects.

name: Earth Witch Hat
description: Popular among young devils for their elegance, the saying goes, "if you wear it, the budding flowers will bloom ahead of you."

name: Ecclesia Purification Cup
description: Smash the Holy Grail to purify all monsters in any Time Rift with Holy Water.  [This unstable invention is moderately effective in controlling the number of monsters swarming out of the Time Rift.  However, complicated production techniques are controlled by the church. We can only get them through special ways... We're considering one thing that what can we do if monsters are immune to it? ...]

name: Eclipse Limited Chest
description: The pack can be opened after EP 2.0 Pet Lover is launched, to receive Lunatic Egg x1, Eclipsex1.

name: Eclipse Limited Chest
description: The pack can be opened after EP 2.0 Pet Lover is launched, to receive Lunatic Egg x1, Eclipsex1.
